body.name: JISULIFE Handheld Mini Lash Fan with Bracket, Small Portable USB Rechargeable Personal Makeup/Eyelash Fan with 3 Speeds for Women Mom Girls Office Outdoor Travel Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 48 mins
features: 【Stylish Ultra Slim Design】JISULIFE portable fan adopts an ultra-slim design, simple and stylish. Mini fan portable innovative five-blade fan with strong airflow, 30% improvement in airflow and 50% increase in wind power, and a maximum speed of up to 6000r/min, making you cool wherever you go.

【3 Wind Speeds】JISULIFE personal fan can adjust the wind speed by pressing the power button, 1 gear soft wind for about 14 hours, 2 gear cool wind for 9 hours, 3 gear strong wind for 4 hours. Mini handheld fan with security lock design, and double protection. If you use the security lock, remember to unlock the security lock（Dial-up "on"）, and then press the power button to turn on the fan.

【Low Noise Operation】JISULIFE small portable fan body is made of high-quality PC material, wear-resistant and durable odorless, built-in fine DC brushless motor, low noise operation more intimate, makeup fan using the principle of rotary inertia, arc blade rotation more powerful.

【Small and Portable】JISULIFE pocket mini fan comes with a long lanyard, which can be hung around the neck without having to hold the fan all the time. The rear bracket design can transform into a desktop fan in seconds. The handheld fan weight is only 104g, suitable for work, travel, outdoors, sleeping, makeup, commuting, etc. It is an ideal gift for men women moms kids girls boys.

【Rechargeable Battery】JISULIFE portable fan rechargeable has a built-in 2000mAh rechargeable battery with TYPE-C charging port, fully charged in just 3 hours, compatible with any USB-C port such as socket/mobile power/laptop, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Search is Over!
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this fan! I am constantly searching for the next "hot flash fan" to add to my life. This is it. Not only is it absolutely the perfect fan to keep in your purse or your car for those embarrassing sweaty moments, but I use it around the house like crazy. One example: when I wash tiny bottles or vases, I put them in front of this little fan to dry before putting them away. The battery seems to last forever, and I just can't recommend it enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan
reviews.reviewText: I have so many fans and this duck fan is just so simple and great to use on a hot day. My favorite feature is the Hold switch like we had on our old discmans so it won’t turn on while in your bag. Also it’s pretty strong, I keep it on speed 2 and that’s perfect. Speed 3 is a little loud but not annoying, it pushes good air for about 2-3 ft. I did a battery test, on low it ran from 1:38 am until 4:30 pm. That was the last time I checked the fan and then dozed off for about 15 minutes and it had shut off within that window. So it got about 14-15 hours of runtime on low. Charged back up in 3 hours. I also like the little kickstand that keeps it pointed at just the right angle when set on a table. It’s just a good little compact fan with a big battery to last you your whole outing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great, compact travel fan!
reviews.reviewText: I had a couple other folding compact fans to carry around that worked okay, but they were still kind of bulky when they were folded because the handle swiveled around to "fold". When I would throw those in the backpack to carry around, they were still bigger than a tennis ball size. Those other fans also only charged with a micro-USB cable, which is sorely outdated at this point. The rechargeable batteries inside those fans are not replaceable and they stopped holding a charge, so I needed to find something new.This JISULIFE Handheld Mini Fan is exactly what I was looking for because it is compact and flat (smaller than my travel battery pack), charges via USB-C (just like most of my other devices), and it has a kick stand so I can set it on the table while angled towards my face! I love that there is a separate on/off switch, so it won't accidentally turn on while bouncing around while in my bag. Bonus points for the lanyard loop and included lanyard if you don't have one. I hope this one will last a long time because it has been great so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Well For Me.
reviews.reviewText: Love the size and ease of use. Works for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great output and white noise
reviews.reviewText: I need a fan to sleep. This is perfect for traveling! Wish it came with a cord. I’m in the hunt for one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this fan for my international flight. Some airplane no longer has direct airflow, which is an issue for me. Classic over-heater. Compact, silent & has a kickstand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little fan
reviews.reviewText: I just love this little fan. Small size fits easily into any purse. It puts out a lot of air and is rechargeable! Plus it has a switch to turn off so the button doesn’t get turned on in your purse! And it’s super lightweight!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Portable and Convenient
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan on a mini trip to Duluth for my birthday. I was a cute little fan since it's not big and bulky and doesn't take up too much space in my purse because of how flat it is! I did find that because the fan had a smaller battery, I couldn't have it on the 3rd mode all the time because it would run out of juice.The fan was powerful but it wasn't as strong as I liked. I had to keep the fan close to my face in order to get the most out of the fan. In simple words, the wind isn't straightforward, it is spread out so if you want to get the most wind, you have to bring your face close to the fan in order to stay cool.The fan works well and perfect for what it is, it's just not as strong/powerful as I wish it was. I will still continue bringing this fan out whenever I travel because it is nice and convenient to have on had as to not.
Es más caro que los de las tiendas chinas, pero es de mucho mejor calidad y el puerto para cargarse es tipo C

This is a convenient size, flat, compact and quality fan on the go or at home. I bought it for my mom at my house when her mean menopausal hot flashes are getting the best of her. I also found it convenient for myself, especially with the pull out stand. The 3 speeds are awesome. Easy to recharge and battery life seems to last long so far.
El abanico portátil me sirve bastante, sobre todo en esta epoca de calor tan extrema.
Ne me quitte plus. Le seul remède efficace aux bouffées de chaleur. Pas encombrant, de bonne confection, j'adore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sleek design only slightly thicker than a modern smartphone and a little smaller otherwise than my iphone. Fits into most clothing or bag pockets with ease.I like that it comes with a solid stand and 3 speed modes, all of which are quite quiet for the winds they produce!Even level 1 out of 3 is enough for most tube commutes and I’m sure levels 2 and 3 will get the job done in those insanely packed summer tubes.Battery has been excellent so far and it charges quickly via usb-c. It also comes with an on/off switch to ensure no random activations in your bag/pocket.10/10, would recommend!
